name: monetization_strategy
description: Develop comprehensive revenue generation strategies and pricing models
command: mirador chain creative_entrepreneur creative_entrepreneur "Create a multi-faceted monetization strategy for [BUSINESS TYPE] including pricing models, revenue streams, and scaling approach"
notes: This chain uses the creative_entrepreneur twice to first generate business models and then refine them with critical analysis. The dual-pass approach results in more robust monetization strategies with both innovation and practical implementation steps.
